printer.autodetect:
MFG:Oce;MDL:Oce VarioPrint 2090 PS3; Oce Oce VarioPrint 2090 PS3
No Autodetection features available, since it is a network printer

comments.en:
Versatile light production system
The Oce VarioPrint 2090 is a light production system that can handle diverse complex printing requirements. It provides convenient, cost-effective production to optimise your asset investment.
  • Simultaneous scanning, printing and finishing
  • 85 A4 prints per minute
  • Full productivity independent of job characteristics
  • Digital mailbox function for controlled printing

Maximum paper width: 11.7 inches / 29.7 cm (Wide format printer)

Printing engine speed: 85 pages/min
